title: Warrior I
description: Primary body parts engaged Glutes & Hip Flexors, Hamstrings, Middle Back / Lats, Quadriceps, Upper Back & Lower Traps Calves, Obliques, Shoulders Strengthens arms and back, stretches hip flexors Stretches lungs, stimulates digestion Increases stamina, improves balance How to perform Warrior I Begin standing.
